programme.desc: Nature's vicious battles for survival come at every scale, from 6 ton Elephants, fighting in a testosterone fuelled blind fury, to slime covered inch and half long amphibian kick boxers, dangling in the jaws of death. This is a no-holds barred look at cold-hearted killers in the wild, revealing ambush experts with piercing canines, slithering assassins with crushing coils, and multi-layered fangs dealing death, in Animal Fight Club..

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: This episode reveals the secret tactics of the Animal Kingdom's most ferocious feline fighters, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from Africa, the Americas and beyond. From the big to the small, the fearsome to the furry, the world's most crazy cat contenders make for an adrenaline-fueled Animal Fight Club.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: On the African Plains, the American Highlands, and the Desert Badlands, Animal Fight Night exposes nature, red in tooth and claw. Lions go head to head, a Grey Wolf pack takes on a Grizzly, Hippos hammer out a violent battle, and one of the world's largest monkeys plans a mission to murder. Lust, Jealousy, and Pure Rage fuel deadly encounters in the wild, as the natural world shows its savage side.
